edu.cwru.sepia.util

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.util.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for logging errors. Only has a single instance, which by default sends messages to System.err. A different target may be provided using open(String) or open(OutputStream).
    Author:
    Tim

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Logger.MessageLevel
      A list of different levels of urgency of messages
